H0.text: Also called The Roodee, which, officially, is Britain’s oldest and shortest racecourse. Epsom

H1.text: Also called The Roodee, which, officially, is Britain’s oldest and shortest racecourse. Ascot

H2.text: Also called The Roodee, which, officially, is Britain’s oldest and shortest racecourse. Goodwood

H3.text: Also called The Roodee, which, officially, is Britain’s oldest and shortest racecourse. Chester

A4.text: Chester Racecourse is officially recognised by Guinness World Records as the 'oldest racecourse still in operation'.

A5.text: It is also thought to be the smallest racecourse of significance in England at 1 mile and 1 furlong (1.8 km) long.
